title: Council Regulation (EEC) No 3845/89 of 18 December 1989 amending Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the common customs tariff
header:
COUNCIL  REGULATION (EEC) No 3845/89
of 18 December 1989
amending Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 on the tariff and statistical nomenclature and on the Common Customs Tariff
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The date '31 December 1989' in Article 5 (4) of Regulation (EEC) No 2658/87 is hereby replaced by '31 December 1990'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 18 December 1989.
For the Council
The President
P. BĂRĂGOVOY
(1) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 282, 2. 10. 1989, p. 1.
